Class uci.gef.NetList

  Summary 

public class  NetList
     extends uci.gef.NetPrimitive
     implements java.io.Serializable
{
          // Constructors 1
     public NetList();

          // Methods 8
     public void addEdge(NetEdge);
     public void addNode(NetNode);
     public Vector getEdges();
     public Vector getNodes();
     public String name();
     public void name(String);
     public void removeEdge(NetEdge);
     public void removeNode(NetNode);
}

A class that implements the concept of a connected graph. A NetList is not any one object in the connected graph, it is the overall graph. A NetList contains a list of nodes and edges. This class is used by DefaulGraphModel, if you implement your own GraphModel, you can use your own application-specific representation of graphs. Needs-more-work: this should probably move to package uci.graph.
